Description:
Implement and coordinate the operational aspects of ongoing Channel Sales activities. You will serve as liaison between Channel Sales Leadership and Distributors. You will review status of projects and budgets. You will support schedules and prepare status reports. You will discover project issues and deploy resolutions to meet productivity, quality, and customers satisfaction goals and objectives.
